document_data.name: Run
document_data.refs: {{Cite dragon/316/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: The Black Dwarf Mine|74}}
document_data.mainbody: '''The Run''' was a spur that connected the [[Trade Way]] to the [[Long Road]], bypassing [[Waterdeep]]. The road ran in a southwest-northeast direction a few miles outside of the city. Along the way, a drover's trail led off to the [[Black Dwarf Mine]] in the hills.
